description:
As the CEO of Codebility, you lead a forward-thinking technology company that specializes in providing innovative software solutions and digital transformation services. Under your leadership, Codebility has become a hub for skilled developers, creative thinkers, and problem solvers, delivering cutting-edge web, mobile, and custom software applications tailored to client needs.

You prioritize fostering a collaborative and growth-oriented environment, mentoring a team of talented professionals while driving the company's vision of excellence, efficiency, and innovation. With a strong focus on delivering quality, building meaningful client relationships, and embracing emerging technologies, you guide Codebility to consistently exceed expectations and create impactful solutions in an ever-evolving tech landscape.

Your leadership philosophy centers on empowering individuals, cultivating a culture of creativity and inclusivity, and positioning Codebility as a trusted partner for businesses seeking to leverage technology for success.

Designed and create high fidelity mockups into responsive and interactive web pages in Figma, ensuring an engaging and user-friendly experience.

Translate design mockups into fully functional web pages using the Vue.js framework and Tailwind 
CSS, ensuring responsiveness, performance optimization, and adherence to design specifications

Integrate and implement APIs to facilitate seamless communication between the front-end and back-end, ensuring efficient data retrieval, processing, and display within the web application.

Work directly with clients to gather and understand their design requirements, ensuring their vision and desired aesthetics were accurately reflected in the final UI/UX designs.
Led and managed software development projects, codeveloped the Ani-un and Harry Potter games using Python, and helped contributed to the development of the USA Connect website.

description: I completed my On-the-Job Training (OJT) at Pamantasan ng Cabuyao, where I developed a web application for curriculum scheduling. The system includes multiple modules that assist in generating class schedules across different departments, including schedules for teachers, students, and room assignments. Instead of using AI, we implemented a decision tree approach to handle the scheduling process efficiently.

Assisted developed software development projects, implemented an audit log trail in knack no code platform using javascript, developed a GIS for MPA FishMApp using Flutter and Firebase, and contributed to data deduplication and cleaning by creating an automation script in Python.

Experienced in developing and testing scalable web applications from end to end. Proficient in full stack development using Node.js (Express), ReactJS (JavaScript), and Sequelize (MySQL). Passionate about delivering high-quality software through robust unit and integration testing with Jest, and ensuring UI reliability through automated end-to-end testing using Playwright. I thrive in collaborative Agile environments, with a strong focus on clean, maintainable code that supports long-term product success.

During my internship at Lexmark International as a DX Solutions Developer, I was tasked with building automations and digital workers that streamlined business processes and reduced manual effort. I also developed applications that integrated with these automation workflows, enabling seamless user interaction with backend processes, and created Power BI dashboards to provide clear data visualizations and actionable insights for business teams. Despite having no prior knowledge of automation or Power BI at the start of my internship, I was able to quickly learn and successfully deliver production-ready solutions. This experience strengthened my skills in backend development, API integration, and data-driven applications while showcasing my ability to adapt, learn new technologies rapidly, and contribute effectively to cross-functional teams.
